requirements.text: Apply a consistent romantic, pastel, dreamy visual theme across all pages using: baby blue, lavender, blush pink, cream, and soft gold sparkles. The overall feel must be warm, personal, and â€œmagical like a birthday surprise.â€

quotes: The aesthetic should be pastel and dreamy: baby blue, lavender, blush pink, cream, and soft gold sparkles.
Every page should feel warm, personal, and magical like a birthday surprise.

acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a coherent pastel palette (baby blue, lavender, blush pink, cream) with soft gold sparkle accents.
Typography, spacing, and components feel soft/romantic (rounded shapes, gentle shadows/glows) and are visually consistent across pages.

requirements.text: Add smooth fade transitions between pages/screens so navigation feels gentle and magical (including when using â€œNextâ€ and â€œReplay the Surpriseâ€).

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating between pages uses a visible fade-out/fade-in transition (no abrupt cut).
â€œReplay the Surpriseâ€ returns to Page 1 with the same smooth transition.

requirements.text:
Implement ambient animated visuals throughout the experience:
- Floating hearts
- Gentle glitter
- Tiny stars
Also include page-specific visuals:
- Page 1: floating hearts background + a cute hopping rabbit
- Page 2: soft sparkles around the text
- Page 3: a cute rabbit holding a tiny balloon
- Page 4: glowing gold sparkles + slow floating hearts
- Page 5: confetti hearts, flying balloons, glitter rain, cute rabbits, and a soft pastel sky background

quotes: Include floating hearts, gentle glitter, tiny stars, and a cute cartoon rabbit that appears on different pages.
Background: floating hearts + one cute hopping rabbit.
Add soft sparkles around the text.
Add a cute rabbit holding a tiny balloon.
Add glowing gold sparkles and slow floating hearts.
Add: Confetti hearts, Flying balloons, Glitter rain, Cute rabbits, Soft pastel sky background

acceptanceCriteria: Hearts, glitter, and stars are visibly animated (subtle motion) and do not block reading/interacting with content.
Page 1 shows a rabbit in a hopping pose/animation.
Page 2 shows a sparkle effect localized around the text area (not only global background).
Page 3 shows a rabbit holding a small balloon near the wish input.
Page 4 has a noticeable gold-glow sparkle effect plus slower-floating hearts than earlier pages.
Page 5 includes all specified finale effects simultaneously (confetti hearts, balloons, glitter rain, rabbits, pastel sky background).

requirements.text:
Add soft instrumental background music that plays across the whole experience with gentle behavior:
- Starts automatically when the experience begins (with a clear fallback if autoplay is blocked)
- Loops seamlessly
- Does not restart on every page navigation
- Provide a simple, unobtrusive control to mute/unmute (and optionally adjust volume)
acceptanceCriteria: Background music is present, loops, and persists across page navigation without restarting each time.
If browser autoplay is blocked, the UI provides an obvious way to start playback (e.g., a subtle â€œTap to play musicâ€ prompt).
User can mute/unmute via a small control that remains accessible throughout the experience.

requirements.text:
Capture and use the userâ€™s interactions on each page in the UI:
- Page 1: selecting a feeling option visibly highlights the selected option (and keeps it selected until changed)
- Page 2: selecting a memory option visibly highlights the selected option
- Page 3: wish input should allow typing and preserve the entered text when navigating forward/back during the session
- Optional: On Page 5, reflect the Page 3 wish somewhere subtly (only if it can be done without adding new user-facing text beyond whatâ€™s already specified)

quotes: Provide a typing box where he can write his wish.

acceptanceCriteria: Option buttons on Pages 1 and 2 have a clear selected state after click/tap.
The wish text box accepts input and retains the typed content during the session when moving between pages.
No backend persistence is required; interactions persist at least within the current session/navigation flow.

requirements.text: Add required static assets (generated images) to the frontend and use them in the UI/animations. Store generated assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend (do not serve images through the backend).

quotes: Include ... a cute cartoon rabbit that appears on different pages.

acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The rabbit and pastel sky visuals in the UI use the generated assets (not external URLs).
No backend endpoints are used to fetch or render images.

constraints: Frontend must not modify files under immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
nonGoals: Do not add Internet Identity authentication (not requested).
Do not persist the wish or selections to the backend/canister unless explicitly requested later.
Do not add third-party integrations (analytics, social APIs, external music streaming).
